expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure
expectations.evidence: Project Structure section (lines 76-89) with tree diagram showing src/api/, src/workers/, src/shared/

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands
expectations.evidence: Build and Run section with npm run dev, npm run build. Testing section with npm test, npm run test:ci

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies
expectations.evidence: Overview: 'TypeScript backend service...Express...Prisma...BullMQ backed by Redis...Zod'

expectations.text: The file mentions database migration or seeding commands
expectations.evidence: Database section: npm run db:migrate, npm run db:seed

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler
expectations.evidence: Line 23: 'npm install' in code block under '# Install dependencies' comment. Verbose section structure with separate code blocks for each command.

expectations.text: Commands are formatted as bullet list items rather than headings with code blocks
expectations.evidence: Commands use heading + code block format: '## Build and Run' with ```bash block, '## Database' with ```bash block, '## Testing' with ```bash block
